data.name: Jamie's Dream
data.detailed_description:
Jamie's Dream is a short, emotional, experimental, psychological horror narrative experience and also the first project being developed by the small independent studio CartonBox. The main character in this thriller is Jamie, who walks through nightmares while being tormented by fears and memories of recent events, revealed as the player goes deeper and deeper into the abyss of Jamie's mind. This game is being developed with the focus on it's narrative component, but there will be small puzzles to be solved and decisions to be taken. This will also be a very short game, we are currently aiming at a 30 min gameplay, with the possibility of multiple endings and paths along the way.

This game was initially created as an entry to the stop-motion 2017 game jam.
It also carries inspirations from games like Pinstripe, Little Nightmares, Neverending Nightmares, Inside and The Dream Machine.

data.short_description: Jamie's Dream is a short, emotional, experimental, psychological horror narrative experience. Walk through nightmares, facing fears and memories as they are revealed going deeper and deeper into the abyss of Jamie's mind.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260, ATI Radeon 4870 HD, or equivalent card with at least 512 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.10 or higher
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260, ATI Radeon 4870 HD, or equivalent card with at least 512 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or later (64-bit)
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260, ATI Radeon 4870 HD, or equivalent card with at least 512 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

movies.name: There would be no pain nor delight
